all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And let every man esteem his brother as himself, and practice virtue and holiness before me.
Doctrine and Covenants 38:24
Quote of the Day
"The Lord can strengthen us and bear us up in whatever difficulties we are called upon to experience."
Brook P. Hales | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
